description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A History of Domestic Manners and Sentiments in England during the Middle Ages ... With illustrations from the illuminations in contemporary manuscripts and other sources, drawn & engraved by F. W. Fairholt" Author: Wright, Thomas Contributor: FAIRHOLT, Frederick William. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9510.dd.4." Page: 105 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1862 Publisher: Chapman & Hall Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003984714 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
